name: @larascript-framework/compose
description: A utility function for implementing the mixin pattern in TypeScript, allowing you to compose classes with multiple behaviors by combining a base class with one or more mixin functions.
author: ben.shepherd@gmx.com

scripts.check: npm run format && npm run lint:fix && npm run typecheck && npm run check-exports
scripts.upstream:setup: git remote add upstream git@github.com:ben-shepherd/larascript-forkable-bundle.git && git remote set-url --push upstream no-pushing
scripts.upstream:merge: git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
scripts.upstream:rebase: git fetch upstream && git rebase upstream/main
